{% comment %} vim: binary noendofline When editing this file, please make sure that this file does NOT have a trailing newline. That would result in line breaks inside a tag which is just ugly in the resulting HTML. The tests will fail if you do so by accident :) {% endcomment %}{% load floppyforms_internals l10n %}{% for name, value in attrs.items %} {{ name }}{% if not value|istrue %}="{% localize off %}{{ value }}{% endlocalize %}"{% endif %}{% endfor %}
